BR1M is just a political gimmick to get votes. Anyone and everyone looking for a pathetic few hundred bucks from the government are either stupid or poor ppl mentality. You give someone a crutch, they automatically get weaker. Which is why a certain race today despite given so many crutches by government are losing to other races in highly competitive industries. How can a few hundred bucks make a difference to someone's life? They will spend it on bullshit, probably weed or splash it on a holiday. Makes no difference to quality of life. It's very sad how many people actually look forward to a 'handout' from government. Sorry I know I digressed from the topic but BR1M is such a scam and I'm shocked at the general mentality here of how they think the government is 'helping'.

PETALING JAYA: Perluasan pelepasan cukai bagi pembelian akhbar arus perdana, telefon pintar, tablet, langganan internet serta bayaran ahli gimnasium akan menggembirakan pembayar cukai.Diumumkan sebagai pelepasan cukai gaya hidup dalam pembentangan Bajet 2017 semalam, Dekan Fakulti Perniagaan di Universiti Sains dan Teknologi Malaysia percaya ianya akan melegakan banyak pihak terutamanya kumpulan B40.Pelepasan itu tambahan kepada 3 jenis pembelian sedia ada iaitu bahan bacaan, komputer dan peralatan sukan.“Peralatan seperti telefon pintar dan tablet merupakan sesuatu yang popular dalam kalangan penduduk Malaysia,” kata Dr Yeah Kim Leng kepada FMT.Sudah tentu ia membawa kebaikan kepada banyak pihak.”Pelepasan ini diberi sehingga 2,500 ringgit setiap tahun, berkuatkuasa mulai tahun taksiran 2017, kata Perdana Menteri Datuk Seri Najib Razak
